channel.title: Surprises on Hey guys, I'm Tiago
channel.description: Recent content in Surprises on Hey guys, I'm Tiago

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: Clear your mind. Assimilate the nature. Search within your soul. Adjust to the right angle.

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: I have a million stories but cannot tell them with pride. All the world’s wisdom can be found inside. In which book will the next clue stay. Walk to my door, the answer won’t run away.

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: I am your favorite Little Field. Here is where I lay. Give me a call to find out your next spot, but take a picture to record this day.

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: For at the front, but it isn’t Python. Aveiro on the back, but it isn’t √çlhavo, and one in the middle of both lies. Where am I?

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: I always run, but never walk, often murmur, but never talk. I have a bed, but never sleep, have a mouth but never eat. I run in sweet spots but I am as salty as the sea, sitting near me lies your next key.

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: Follow your instincts. Engage your mind. Use what you know you have. Persevere, and never look back.

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: I always run, but never walk. Often murmur, but never talk. I have a bed but never sleep, have a mouth but never eat. At my side lays your next key, cross the bridge and you will see.

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: Cross the bridge for me to die, In a garden I will lay. To pay me your respects, Take a picture to remember this day.

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: Sed at the front, but it isn’t Praxis, Porto on the back, but it isn’t Gaia, and Du in the middle, but it isn’t your home. Where am I?

item.title: Choose Wisely...
item.description: I am one of Gods favorites, not John, not Paul, not Peter. I can take you home, away, near, far. I’ll let you study and travel, and with company I am a delight. What am I?
